price: (ئەی موحەممەد ﷺ) بڵێ من تەنھا ترسێنەرێکم و ھیچ پەرستراوێکی ڕاست نیە بێجگە لە خوای تەنھای بەدەسەڵات
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٞۖ وَمَا مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā anā mundhirun wamā min ilāhin illā al-lahu al-wāḥidu al-qahāru
